title: Jan Hesterman
text:
Jan Hesterman (18 March 1893, <a href="Amsterdam">Amsterdam</a> – 16 December 1963, Amsterdam) was a Dutch <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1920%20Summer%20Olympics">1920 Summer Olympics</a>. In 1920 he was eliminated in the second round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201920%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20middleweight">middleweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="William%20Bradley%20%28boxer%29">William Bradley</a>.
He was the older brother of <a href="Wim%20Hesterman">Wim Hesterman</a> and <a href="Catharina%20Hesterman">Catharina Hesterman</a>.
